children: Atha sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni
innerText: Atha sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni, tāni tāni parassapadasaññāni honti.

children.innerText: Ti anti, si tha, mi ma

innerText: Taṃ yathā? Ti anti, si tha, mi ma.
Sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni. Tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni honti.

children.innerText: Te ante, se vhe, e mhe

innerText: Taṃ yathā? Te ante, se vhe, e mhe.

children: miccanena kvattho? Attanopadāni bhāve ca kammani.
innerText: Attanopadamiccanena kvattho? Attanopadāni bhāve ca kammani.
Tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadānaṃ, attanopadānañca dve dve padāni paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
Taṃ yathā? Ti anti iti paṭhamapurisā, si tha iti majjhimapurisā, mi ma iti uttamapurisā. Attanopadānampi te ante iti paṭhamapurisā, se vhe iti majjhimapurisā, e mhe iti uttamapurisā. Evaṃ sabbattha.

children: miccanena kvattho? Nāmamhi payujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamo, tumhe majjhimo, amhe uttamo.
innerText: Paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisamiccanena kvattho? Nāmamhi payujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamo, tumhe majjhimo, amhe uttamo.
Sabbesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ paṭhamamajjhimuttama purisānaṃ ekābhidhāne paro puriso gahetabbo.
So ca paṭhati, tvañca paṭhasi, tumhe paṭhatha. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi. Tumhe pacatha. Evaṃ sesāsu vibhattīsu paro puriso yojetabbo.
Nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamapuriso hoti.

children: ti kimatthaṃ? Tena haññase tvaṃ devadattena.
innerText: Tulyādhikaraṇeti kimatthaṃ? Tena haññase tvaṃ devadattena.
Tumhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe majjhimapuriso hoti.
Amhe payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe uttamapuriso hoti.
Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe ca anuttakāle pañcamī vibhatti hoti.
Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamī vibhatti hoti.
Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā hiyyattanī vibhatti hoti.
So agamā maggaṃ, te agamū maggaṃ.

children: kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā samīpe
innerText: Ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā apaccakkhe vā samīpe ajjatanīvibhatti hoti.
So maggaṃ agamī, te maggaṃ agamuṃ.
Hiyyattanīajjatanīiccetā vibhattiyo yadā māyogā, tadā sabbakāle ca honti.
Mā gamā, mā vacā, mā gamī, mā vacī.
So gacchissati, karissati. Te gacchissanti, karissanti.
Kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle kālātipatti vibhatti hoti.
So ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissā, agacchissā. Te ce taṃ yānaṃ alabhissaṃsu, agacchissaṃsu.

children.innerText: Vattamānā ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe

innerText: 423, 426.Vattamānā ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.

children: iccesā saññā hoti ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetesaṃ
innerText: Vattamānā iccesā saññā hoti ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: Pañcamī tu antu, hitha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase

innerText: 424, 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hitha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase.

children: saññā hoti tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase iccetesaṃ
innerText: Pañcamīiccesā saññā hoti tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṃ antaṃ, ssu vho, e āmase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: Sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyā si eyyā tha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe

innerText: 425, 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyā si eyyā tha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe.

children: iccesā saññā hoti eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho, eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe iccetesaṃ
innerText: Sattamī iccesā saññā hoti eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho, eyyāvho, eyyaṃ eyyāmhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: Parokkhā au ettha, aṃmha, tthare, ttho vho, iṃ mhe

innerText: 426, 459.Parokkhā au ettha, aṃmha, tthare, ttho vho, iṃ mhe.

children: iccesā saññā hoti a u, ettha, aṃ mha, ttha re ttho vho, iṃ mhe iccetesaṃ
innerText: Parokkhā iccesā saññā hoti a u, ettha, aṃ mha, ttha re ttho vho, iṃ mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: āū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase

innerText: 427, 455.Hiyyattanīāū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase.

children: iccesā saññā hoti ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase iccetesaṃ
innerText: Hiyyattanī iccesā saññā hoti ā ū, o ttha, aṃ mhā, ttha tthuṃ, se vhaṃ, iṃ mhase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
Hiyyattanī iccanena kvattho? Hiyyopabhuti paccakkhe hiyyattanī.

children.innerText: Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe

innerText: 428, 468.Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, aṃ mhe.

children: iccesā saññā hoti ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃmhā, ā ū, sevhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetesaṃ
innerText: Ajjatanī iccesā saññā hoti ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃmhā, ā ū, sevhaṃ, aṃ mhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe

innerText: 429, 472.Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe.

children: iccesā saññā hoti ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe iccetesaṃ
innerText: Bhavissantī iccesā saññā hoti ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃ ssāmhe iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.

children.innerText: ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha sissu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase

innerText: 430, 373.Kālātipattissā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha sissu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase.

children: iccesā saññā hoti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase iccetesaṃ
innerText: Kālātipatti iccesā saññā hoti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃ ssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃ ssāmhase iccetesaṃ dvādasannaṃ padānaṃ.
Kālātipatti iccanena kvattho? Kriyātipanne’ tīte kālātipatti.
Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātuka saññā honti.

Karoti, gacchati. Yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati = kāreti. Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati = pabbatāyati. Taḷākaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.

children.innerText: Tija gupa kita māne hi kha cha sā vā

innerText: 433, 528.Tija gupa kita māne hi kha cha sā vā.
Tija gupa kita mānu iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā honti vā.

children.innerText: Bhuja ghasa hara su pādīhi tumicchatthesu

innerText: Bhujaghasa hara su pāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati = pabbatāyati, taḷākaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati = samuddāyati, saddo cicciṭamiva attānamācarati = cicciṭāyati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
Nāmato upamānā ācāratthe ca īyapaccayo hoti.
Achattaṃ chattamiva ācarati =chattīyati, aputtaṃ puttamiva ācarati=puttīyati.

children: ti kimatthaṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
innerText: Ācāreti kimatthaṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
Attano pattamicchati = pattīyati. Evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, dhanīyati, ghaṭīyati.

children: ti kimatthaṃ? Aññassa pattamicchati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.
innerText: Atticchattheti kimatthaṃ? Aññassa pattamicchati. Evamaññepi yojetabbā.

children.innerText: Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe

innerText: 438, 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
Sabbehi dhātūhi ṇeṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayaiccete paccayā honti kāritasaññā ca hetvatthe.

children: Yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati

= kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārā payati. Ye keci karonti, te aññe ‘‘karotha karotha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti. Yo koci pacati, taṃ añño ‘‘pacāhi pacāhi’’iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Ye keci pacanti, te aññe ‘‘pacatha pacatha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = pācenti, pācayanti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayanti. Evaṃ bhaṇeti, bhaṇayati, bhaṇāpeti, bhaṇāpayati. Bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. Tathariva aññepi yojetabbā.
innerText: Yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ‘‘karohi karohi’’ iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati = kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārā payati. Ye keci karonti, te aññe ‘‘karotha karotha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti. Yo koci pacati, taṃ añño ‘‘pacāhi pacāhi’’iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. Ye keci pacanti, te aññe ‘‘pacatha pacatha’’ iccevaṃ bruvanti = pācenti, pācayanti, pācāpenti. Pācāpayanti. Evaṃ bhaṇeti, bhaṇayati, bhaṇāpeti, bhaṇāpayati. Bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. Tathariva aññepi yojetabbā.
Tasmā nāmasmā ṇayapaccayo hoti kāritasañño ca dhāturūpe sati.

children: Hatthinā atikkamati maggaṃ = atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati gītaṃ = upavīṇayati, daḷhaṃ karoti vīriyaṃ
innerText: Hatthinā atikkamati maggaṃ = atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati gītaṃ = upavīṇayati, daḷhaṃ karoti vīriyaṃ = daḷhayati, visuddhā hoti ratti = visuddhayati.

children: iccete paccayā honti. Santaṃ karoti = santārati, upakkamaṃ karoti = upakkamālati.
innerText: Caggahaṇena āra ālaiccete paccayā honti. Santaṃ karoti = santārati, upakkamaṃ karoti = upakkamālati.
Ṭhīyate, bujjhate, paccate, labbhate, karīyate, yujjate, uccate.

children: vaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātūnaṃ antena saha yathāsambhavaṃ.
innerText: Tassa yapaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātūnaṃ antena saha yathāsambhavaṃ.

Vuccate, vuccante, uccate, uccante, paccate, paccante. Majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante. Bujjhate, bujjhante, kujjhate, kujjhante, ujjhate, ujjhante. Haññate, haññante. Kayyate, kayyante. Dibbate, dibbante.

children: mhi paccaye, pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vā.
innerText: Sabbehi dhātūhi yamhi paccaye, pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vā.
Vuḍḍhate, phallate, dammate, sakkate, labbhate, dissate.
Yathā heṭṭhā bhāvakammesu yapaccayassa ādeso hoti tathā kattaripi yapaccayassa ādeso kātabbo.

children: paccayo hoti kattari, pubbe niggahitāgamo hoti.
innerText: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato apaccayo hoti kattari, pubbe niggahitāgamo hoti.
Caggahaṇena i ī e oiccete paccayā honti niggahitapubbañca.
Rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhoti, sumbhoti, parisumbhoti.
Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇā u ṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari.

children: , abhisuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti, āvuṇoti, āvuṇāti, pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti.
innerText: Abhisuṇoti , abhisuṇāti, saṃvuṇoti, saṃvuṇāti, āvuṇoti, āvuṇāti, pāpuṇoti, pāpuṇāti.
Kiṇāti, jināti, dhunāti, munāti, lunāti, punāti.
Gahaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ppaṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari.
Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato o yiraiccete paccayā honti kattari.

children: , tanohi, karoti, karohi, kayi rati, kayirāhi.
innerText: Tanoti , tanohi, karoti, karohi, kayi rati, kayirāhi.

children: iccete paccayā honti kattari, kāritasaññā ca.
innerText: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari, kāritasaññā ca.
Coreti, corayati, cinteti, cintayati, manteti, mantayati.
Bhāve ca kammani ca attanopadāni honti.
Uccate, uccante, majjate, majjante, yujjate, yujjante, kujjhate, kujjhante, labbhate, labbhante, kayyate, kayyante.

children: , jigucchati, vīmaṃsati, samuddāyati, puttīyati, kāreti, pāceti.
innerText: Titikkhati , jigucchati, vīmaṃsati, samuddāyati, puttīyati, kāreti, pāceti.

children: iccevamādayo ye saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
innerText: Bhūiccevamādayo ye saddagaṇā, te dhātusaññā honti.
Bhavati, bhavanti, carati, caranti, pacati, pacanti, cintayati, cintayanti, hoti, honti, gacchati, gacchanti.
Ādibhūtānaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ ekassarānaṃ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti.

children: , jigucchati, tikicchati, vīmaṃsati, bubhukkhati, pivāsati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, caṅkamati.
innerText: Titikkhati , jigucchati, tikicchati, vīmaṃsati, bubhukkhati, pivāsati, daddallati, dadāti, jahāti, caṅkamati.
Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo, so abbhāsasañño hoti.
Abbhāse vattamānassa sarassa rasso hoti. Dadhāti, jahāti.
Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa ca vaggo hoti.
Cikicchati , jigucchati, jighacchati, jigīsati, jaṅgamati, caṅkamati.
Mānakitaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ abbhāsagatānaṃ vakāra takārattaṃ hoti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti, akāro vā.
Jigucchati, pivāsati, vīmaṃsati, jighacchati, babhūva, dadhāti.
Tato abbhāsato pāmānaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vāmaṃiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sapaccaye pare.
Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāādesā honti vā.
Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
Byañjanantassa dhātussa co hoti chapaccayesu paresu.
Byañjanantassa dhātussa ko hoti khapaccaye pare.
Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva gīādeso hoti sapaccaye pare.

children: iccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ parokkhāyaṃ vibhattiyaṃ.
innerText: Brūbhūiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ parokkhāyaṃ vibhattiyaṃ.
Gamuiccetassa dhātussa anto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu paccayavibhattīsu.
Gacchamāno, gacchanto. Gacchati, gameti. Gacchatu, gametu. Gaccheyya. Gameyya. Agacchā, agamā. Agacchī, agamī. Gacchissati, gamissati. Agacchissā, agamissā.
Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
Mikāraggahaṇena hivibhattimhi akāro kvaci na dīghamāpajjate. Gacchahi.
Gaccha, gacchāhi, gama, gamāhi, gamaya, gamayāhi.
Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro e ha oha ettamāpajja te bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti vā.
Hehiti, hehinti, hohiti, hohinti, heti, henti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti, hessati, hessanti.
Karaiccetassa dhātussa sapaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, sassa ca niccaṃ lopo hoti.
Kāhati, kāhiti, kāhasi, kāhisi, kāhāmi, kāhāma.

children: iccādayo ādesā honti. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma, vacchāmi, vacchāma.
innerText: Sapaccayaggahaṇena aññehipi bhavissantiyā vibhattiyā khāmi khāma chāmi chāmaiccādayo ādesā honti. Vakkhāmi, vakkhāma, vacchāmi, vacchāma.
Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṃ hoti mimaiccetesu.
Kāreti, kārenti, kārayati, kārayanti, kārāpeti, kārāpenti, kārāpayati, kārāpayanti.

children: dīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kārite.
innerText: Ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kārite.
Ghāṭeti, ghaṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭayati, ghāṭāpeti, ghaṭāpeti, ghāṭāpayati, ghaṭāpayati, gāmeti, gameti, gāmayati, gamayati, gāmāpeti, gamāpeti. Gāmāpayati, gamāpayati.
Aññesu ca paccayesu sabbesaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti.
Guha dusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite.
Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakārassa ukāro hoti yapaccaye pare.
Hakārassa vipariyayo hoti yapaccaye pare, yapaccayassa ca lo hoti vā.
Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghekāro hoti ppapaccaye pare.
Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
Karaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa kāsattaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi.
Kāsattamitibhāvaniddesena aññatthāpi sāgamo hoti. Ahosi, adāsi.

children: desā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
innerText: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā mimaiccetesaṃ vibhattīnaṃ mhimhādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
Asaiccetāya dhātuyā thassa vibhattissa tthattaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tissa vibhattissa tthittaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
Asaiccetāya dhātuyā tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.

children: mhi vibhattimhi antassa lopo ca hoti.
innerText: Asasseva dhātussa simhi vibhattimhi antassa lopo ca hoti.
Labhaiccetāya dhātuyā ī iṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ttha tthaṃādesā honti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
Kusaiccetāya dhātuyā īvibhattissa cchihoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca.
Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā.
Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā.
Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā.

children.innerText: Yamhi dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā mahamathādīnamī

innerText: 502, 493.Yamhi dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā mahamathādīnamī.

children.innerText: dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha matha

innerText: Yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha matha iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto īkāramāpajjate.
Dīyati, dhīyati, mīyati, ṭhīyati, hīyati, pīyati, mahīyati, mathīyati.
Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa ikārādeso hoti yapaccaye pare.

children.innerText: Jara marānaṃ jīra jiyya miyyā vā

innerText: Jara mara iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ jīra jiyya miyyādesā honti vā.
Jīrati, jīranti, jiyyati, jiyyanti, miyyati, miyyanti, marati, maranti.

children: iccetassa dhātussa ādissa lopo hoti vā.
innerText: Sabbattha vibhattipaccayesu asaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa lopo hoti vā.
Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāādesā honti vā.
Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā, yakārattañca.
Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti.
Te o eiccete āva āyādese pāpuṇanti kārite.
Yogavibhāgena aññasmimpi ekārassa āyādeso hoti. Gāyati, gāyanti.

children: ti kimatthaṃ? Gacchati, karoti, labhati, pacati.
innerText: Asabbadhātukamhīti kimatthaṃ? Gacchati, karoti, labhati, pacati.
Idha ākhyāte aniddiṭṭhesu sādhanesu kvaci dhātuvibhattipaccayānaṃ dīghaviparītādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpāni kātabbāni.

children: , kareyya, jāniyā, siyā, kare, gacche, jaññā, vakkhetha, dakkhetha, dicchati, agacchi, agacchuṃ, ahosi, ahesuṃ iccevamādīni aññānipi sādhanāni yojetabbāni.
innerText: Jāyati , kareyya, jāniyā, siyā, kare, gacche, jaññā, vakkhetha, dakkhetha, dicchati, agacchi, agacchuṃ, ahosi, ahesuṃ iccevamādīni aññānipi sādhanāni yojetabbāni.
Kvaci akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanī ajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu vibhattīsu.
Brūiccetāya dhātuyā īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi.
Dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti anekasarassa.
Isu yamu iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ccho hoti vā. Icchati, niyacchati.
